name: SUSFinder
short_description:
SUSFinder is a utility to find and assign IP address to ASUS WL-500G Premium router booted in recovery mode on local network for flashing firmware, in the case that you didn't know router's IP address settings beforehand.

This utility do essentially the same thing as ASUS Firmware Restoration Utility, except that it didn't do the firmware flashing part itself; you still need to do the TFTP flashing manually after the address is set.

Currently, SUSFinder is written in ANSI C with POSIX socket API, thus should be portable to most Unix-like platform (including Cygwin).
summary: Find and assign IP address to ASUS WL-500gP router recovery mode
